SEARCH
Module io.inverno.mod.http.client
Package io.inverno.mod.http.client

Interface Endpoint

public interface Endpoint

An endpoint represents the terminal end in an HTTP communication from a client to a server.

It is obtained from the HttpClient and it is bound to an IP Socket Address of an HTTP server. It exposes methods to send HTTP requests or open Web sockets.

Since:
1.6
Author:
Jeremy Kuhn
